articles.author: Laura Kayali
articles.title: Havana Syndrome linked to Russian military agency GRU, investigation indicates - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: An investigation by Insider, 60 Minutes and Spiegel finds links to GRU unit dedicated to assassination and political destabilization.
articles.content: Now, evidence gathered by the three media outlets present links to GRU’s Unit 29155, an entity entirely dedicated to assassination and political destabilization. Their mission is to find, fix, and fi… [+1450 chars]
